definition: (of a musical instrument) second highest member of a group, the pitch range of the lowest female voice
details:
adjective
- (of a musical instrument) second highest member of a group
= example: (of a musical instrument) second highest member of a group
- of or being the highest male voice
= synonyms: countertenor
- of or being the lowest female voice
= synonyms: contralto
noun
- the pitch range of the lowest female voice
- (of a musical instrument) the second highest instrument in a family of musical instruments
- the highest adult male singing voice
= synonyms: countertenor
- the lowest female singing voice
= synonyms: contralto
- a singer whose voice lies in the alto clef
